settings.heading: How It Started
settings.subheading:
Sound Box Store was born out of years of frustration in the commercial workplace seeking last-minute meeting rooms, searching for an office to take confidential calls/works, or simply looking for a quiet zone to focus on that critical presentation.


Therefore a group of business consultants, architects and industrial designers collaborated with one of the world's leading acoustics manufacturers to create stylish, architecturally designed spaces for the modern office that was versatile, ergonomic and soundproof. 

The booths needed to be highly functional, high performance and attractively priced yet also reflected the team's collective commitment to the environment — to deliver a product with a limited impact on the planet that didn't cost the Earth. So now we're excited to share the booths with you.

settings.title: 10 Years In Acoustic Technology
settings.detection: In association with leading acousticians, architects and interior designers throughout the world, our products epitomizes the most aesthetically creative and contemporary interpretations by design. Carved in compliance to strict international quality standards, our products and systems can be found in many domestic and internationally renowned landmarks from the Far East to Europe and United States of America.

settings.title: We Created Perfection
settings.detection: Out of frustration, we created an alternative by eliminating middle men, sales staff and expensive showrooms. We began producing all products in our own factory and making these designs widely available and affordable once again.

settings.title: In Technology We Trust
settings.detection: By combining highly skilled labor and technological innovations, we’ve streamlined the production and quality assurance processes, resulting in faster, more precise service. Our engineers follow stringent quality assurance standards from the instant production begins to the moment your order leaves our factory.

settings.title: Only Quality Materials Chosen
settings.detection: By sourcing only from the very best factories, we’re able to keep prices low and maintain stringent quality control. Our strict policies on outsourcing is one of the key reasons we’re able to offer a 5-year warranty on every product we offer.

settings.title: Shipped to Your Door
settings.detection: Our factory-to-business model allows us to pass a substantial savings onto you. Your satisfaction is our highest priority, so once production is complete, we inspect your piece(s) scrupulously one last time before initiating shipment. Our hope is that you’ll fall in love with your new acoustic Sound Booth the moment it arrives at your offices.
